actions.name: Sends a message to a channel.
actions.description: Sends a message to a channel.

inputs.name: as_user
inputs.description: Pass true to post the message as the authed user, instead of as a bot. Defaults to false. See [authorship](#authorship) below.

inputs.name: attachments
inputs.description: A JSON-based array of structured attachments, presented as a URL-encoded string.

inputs.name: blocks
inputs.description: A JSON-based array of structured blocks, presented as a URL-encoded string.

inputs.name: channel
inputs.description: Channel, private group, or IM channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name. See [below](#channels) for more details.

inputs.name: icon_emoji
inputs.description: Emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides `icon_url`. Must be used in conjunction with `as_user` set to `false`, otherwise ignored. See [authorship](#authorship) below.

inputs.name: icon_url
inputs.description: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message. Must be used in conjunction with `as_user` set to false, otherwise ignored. See [authorship](#authorship) below.

inputs.name: link_names
inputs.description: Find and link channel names and usernames.

inputs.name: mrkdwn
inputs.description: Disable Slack markup parsing by setting to `false`. Enabled by default.

inputs.name: parse
inputs.description: Change how messages are treated. Defaults to `none`. See [below](#formatting).

inputs.name: reply_broadcast
inputs.description: Used in conjunction with `thread_ts` and indicates whether reply should be made visible to everyone in the channel or conversation. Defaults to `false`.

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: How this field works and whether it is required depends on other fields you use in your API call. [See below](#text_usage) for more detail.

inputs.name: thread_ts
inputs.description: Provide another message's `ts` value to make this message a reply. Avoid using a reply's `ts` value; use its parent instead.

inputs.name: unfurl_links
inputs.description: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

inputs.name: unfurl_media
inputs.description: Pass false to disable unfurling of media content.

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: Set your bot's user name. Must be used in conjunction with `as_user` set to false, otherwise ignored. See [authorship](#authorship) below.
